content.detailedDescription:
I did not take these photos. my friend was visiting & we were sitting around talking. i don't know what brought up the subject but it went to ufo's. my friend asked "did i ever show you the picture i got on my ipod?" i said no. she said she took it 2 years ago over jenson, ky. she had just bought the ipod & heard that it took really good photos so she went outside & started taking photos of the clouds in the night sky. she came back in & checked them. most were black but she noticed one that had a light in the bottom corner. she zoomed in on it [which is the enlarged one] & saw what it was. she did not see or hear anything at the time she took it. she only showed it to her family & my son before showing me. she got a new ipod [or cell phone, i don't know which} & had everything transfered over to the new one. i could not believe what i was seeing when i first saw it. i asked her if she cared if i sent it to you & she said no. 
she is not one to make up stuff or fake things. she is a mother of 3 working to get her degree in physical therepy. she's very level headed & admits she does not know what it is. i asked her if "ufo" ever came to mind & she said yes but was not sure. so here's the pics. hope you can find out what it is. you can contact me if you want to talk to her about it. i will make sure she gets your info. 
ps-could not answer above questions right because i was not there.
content.summary: I did not take these pics. my friend thomassa did.

content.detailedDescription: Driving toward apple valley on hesperia rd as a passenger. noticed a dark boomerang like object in the north/east sky, above green tree liqueur.  struck me really strange, because it was coming toward hesperia rd, before it could turn around and go east i took 1 bad cell phone picture of the object.  the sun was in the way for the picture but you can make it out if you look. i actually took 3 pictures only 1 shows anything. as we rounded the mountain which is highway 18 it was gone, but there was a helicopter buzzing around where it had been.
content.summary: Dark appeared black boomerang object with round edges

content.detailedDescription: It appeared out of no where.
content.summary: Hovered and changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
The reporting system is forcing me to pick a "county" and a event "day", but i really don't know!

steve (who played the boy killed in the original "cowboys" with john wayne) was driving, and i was a passenger north-bound on the freeway when "about watertank level" we saw this bright triangular object.  steve kept saying it was a watertank.  it made no sound and did not move at all.  it was a "perfect triangle" with bright white tips.  it had a zipper of red lights that rotated around it in a clock-wise direction.  the time was right as it was getting dark, about 8:45 or 9pm.  the object never moved, and steve was scared!  we lost sight of it as we drove past the reseda exit.  on the return trip (about 20 minutes later) it was gone.
content.summary: Woman remembers event that occurred 22 years earlier and calls mufon

content.detailedDescription:
i was on the back deck of my home with my girlfriend smoking. i looked up at the moon and noticed what seemed to a very large star very close to it. the star then seemed to slowly move 45 degrees to the side of the moon and stop. it then slowly moved another 45 degrees to the bottom then stop. within a few seconds of the last stop i noticed a contrail that seemed low to the ground, going from south to north. i then looked back up at the shape and watched it do exactly the same thing in reverse. this happened right after the meteor blew up over russia, so i kind of thought it might be military. i have pictures that you can have, they are from my digital camera but may help.

  p.S. if you know what this was please let me know. i have pretty much tried to forget it, but have watched your show since and may'be i'm not crazy.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Never seen anything like this before and know that things moving in the sky cannot move this way.

content.detailedDescription: i didn't report this when it happened.    i was a bit frazzled.    on 5-19-12 at approx 11:45 pm i got the fright of my life.  my son and i went to see a megadeth and rob zombie concert in grand rapids mi.  we were camping afterwards at pj hoffmaster state park that night as it was near the venue...I am from detroit area.  late evening after the concert, my son and i were taking a walk along the dark calm shores of lake michigan when suddenly a super bright light shined directly upon us (about 30 foot in diameter). it lasted about a second.  it targeted us...We had no flashlights...So it saw us infra-red...Or some other way.   we looked up and directly above us was a huge black triangle with a light in each corner that were also shaped like triangles...As they were literally on the pointed corners of the craft... they sort of looked like led lights...A blueish-white color.  my son looked up quicker than i did and was able to see two lights that formed the one-beam light source that shined upon us coming from the mid-front bottom of the craft that rolled back...Like a pair of eyes.   from my perspective i watched the beam of light travel away from us and go up the sand dune....Remember, the beam only lasted a second or less.   the solid black craft was a dorito shape...About 100 to 200 feet in the air.  it was completely silent and moving very slowly.  it was no less than  50 ft. wide and 70 ft long.  it was moving from lake michigan going slightly se over our heads and traveled over the beach and sand dunes...And after about 30-40 seconds it disappeared over the tree line.   we got a fantastic look at it up close because we could clearly see it against the night sky. it had right and left white rectangular strobing taillights that would alternate from one side to the other...Kinda like what you would see on the back of a garbage truck.   it was so close i could see many squares within the rectangles shaped taillights (like bricks in a wall).  at first i thought is was a drone...Because earlier on friday  we heard rush limbaugh talking about drones flying over chicago to monitor the occupiers.  but the next day at home i saw pictures of those drones...They looked like an unmanned spy plane.....Not at all what we saw.   also....Immediatly afterwards we tried calling my wife on my son's cellphone...Which was nothing fancy (i wish we remembered it had a crappy camera in it). the phone wouldn't work for 15 minutes and even then it kept dropping the call.  we were able to use that same phone with no problem minutes before the sighting.
content.summary: Black triangle beamed light down us for about 1 second.  it was slow moving and completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: In 1969 my mom and  dad and me where going to see my sister and brother in law i n elpaso texas a army base dont remember name and my dad said we should get a hair cut so we stopped in roswell at the barber shop the barber ask if i ever heard of roswell i said no he said one day u will and that its true  isat there not knowing what he was talking about so i was going to try and charm him into telling me so i press the point on and on he would not tell me then i felt a little bad because he was getting a litle agitated like wanted to tell me but could n ot so just when he was done he walked behind me and to my left walked down a hallway looking in all the rooms and came back shacking his head said i still cant tell u he seemed a little scared or something i was in 8 grade and thats my story
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription: As mentioned above,this huge blue shape coming from my left to in front of me. this was no bright light the object was clearly visable at about 3oclock in the morning.As this has affected my whole life,if you really want to see a ufo, go to brimfield ma off rt. 20.This is a warning,do not go there unless your mentally capable to see the real thing. i didn't have a choice, you do.
content.summary: Football field classic flying saucer shape 200 yards away in back field

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, so firstly id like to point out that this is my first time on this website (and realistically, any ufo website). dont get me wrong, i do believe that there is other life in the universe, ive just never witnessed anything to help clarify my belief.

i was on my balcony looking at the sunset... there was some cloud, but not much. 
i live close to an airport, and regularly observe airplanes taking off and disappearing in the distance.. this was different!!
i was gazing across the skyline (there were about 4 airplanes in the sky, very easy to distinguish regardless of their distance to me.. suddenly a rocket-like aircraft caught my eye, miles away in the distance. straight away it caught my attention as the distance it seemed to be moving didnt make sense as it was already very very high in the sky.. this thing basically was going up.. and yes up!!! at first i asked myself if this could be a tiny cloud, but after about a minute i realized it certainly was not a cloud. this thing seemed to be going up for about 6 minutes  travelling at quite a pace.. then poof, it disappeared through clouds... 

again, i do want to point out that i am not a regular ufo spotter, nor have i ever claimed to see a ufo.. i am someone who has no problem distinguishing an airplane, no matter how high it is or whatever!!

this is something i have never seen before, and im sure i never will again!
my girlfriend was on the balcony with me, emailing her mother from her phone.I told her after 3 minutes, because i wanted to be sure that i wasnt seeing things or going crazy. as soon as i told her, and she began to observe it, she herself said, are we looking at a ufo. 
im still in a little bit of shock about the whole event, as i am certain that what i saw was not a normal aircraft.
content.summary: Unknown object going straight up in the sky, unlike any airplane

content.detailedDescription: I was at my apartment walking to my car and i looked up at the sky, i was facing west. the sun was setting. there was a very dark cloud above the horizon, but as far as the west mountains. i noticed two lights in the cloud, stationary, flashing in unison every other second. the lights looked circular. then after about 60 seconds they started to descend in unison straight down. then they went lower then i could see. when they were descending and were under the cloud and the light was underneath them i could not see any shape or structure, when the light was not flashing it was like there was nothing in the sky at all. it was very strange. i stood there trying to figure out what it they could possibly be. i saw an airplane off to the southwest but i could see the body of the plane and the lights on the plane. this was so much different. you could only see the lights.
content.summary: Two spheres flashing lights in unison, descended down in unison

content.detailedDescription:
On may 3 was coming out of college by nine, waiting watching could cross the highway schist near the post of the state highway police lapa pr, when i looked to the south, a triangular object, not proves caraceristicas tickets for lights aircraft blink in yellow and red, and is common on nights with clear skies to observe the passage of aircraft in the region and unblinking lights moving slowly before disappearing, not like the planes that disappears at the end of the horizon, also had problems communication for a few minutes, the phones did not work presenting the message no network signal.
i realized i could be a triangle flying when they commented about the "sighting" in curitiba on 13 may this year, a few days after what i saw, do not know if he saw any more, because it is common time always be clear to cloudy nights watching the stars have a few weeks during the year, but since half the time the night sky is overcast during the year.
content.summary: Saida faculty shaped object light triangular plane not be characterized as always watch airplanes and satellites on clear nights,

content.detailedDescription: I saw over 20 aliens in the area.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Ufo event

content.detailedDescription: As a native of columbus, ohio, i have seen many things in the sky that looked strange but turned out to be manmade or natural things, like planets, planes viewed from odd angles, lenticular clouds, planets, etc. but i have never personally seen anything like this. i wear contacts which give me quite good distance viewing, but i need reading glasses for up close focusing. i was on vacation to utah and then points south. after driving through much of rocky mountains (travelling west on i-70 i think, because i recall divided highway at time of the sighting), we emerged into a relatively flat area which had a mountain range running along the far left at some miles away and another to the left-front of car. this was about midday on april 28 or 29, 2013, with little or no clouds in the sky, no rain. i was alert, had no alchohol or drugs in my system and the last thing on my mind was an encounter with something unusual. between my car and the left-front range was a small city (maybe grand junction, colorado ?). probably due to its motion, i happened to observe a metallic circle/sphere near the bottom of the left-front range, situated near the left-end of the range. it was travelling in a near-perfect straight line apparently from the bottom of the range toward the top of the range (apparently not far above treetops). i estimated the object and the range to be at least a couple of miles away (possibly several) due to the size of the city between us, and due to the fact that i could not really make out individual trees on the mountain (the mountainside was sunlit). i have been out to the southwest before and am aware that distances are frequently farther than they appear to native easterners. at first i thought this object was reflection from a helicopter bubble, a balloon, or some sort of ski lift that i was not familiar with, so i was not too concerned, and so unfortunately did not note any details such as specific time nor location. however, i kept watching. diameter of the object was around 10 percent the height of the mountain. to my best recollection, the object rose from the near bottom of the mountain to its ridge in about 5 to 8 seconds after which it made a 90-degree right turn to follow the ridge for about 3 to 5 seconds. at this point it either just disappeared or dropped down the other side of the mountain (it was hard to tell which from my distance combined with car motion). almost immediately after that, i saw what appeared to be the outline of a small jet with contrail shooting up from the other side of the mountain in a steep climb almost in line with where the object had made the 90 degree turn (it occurred to me later that it seemed like the sphere may have been "hiding" from or secretly observing the jet, but this is purely conjecture). during the observation i asked my driving companion if she saw the object but she could not see anything before the event had ended (i don't think her distance vision is as good as mine). i was rather preoccupied with getting to our next destination on our vacation, so i did not stop and take any photo or write down any details. at the time of observation, i was not feeling disturbed or upset but rather curious, skeptic and amazed. however, after i returned from vacation, i have been feeling rather disturbed about this recently, and very much reret not joting the details at the time. it only occurred to me later after the event that the mountain in question had to be at least a few thousand feet high, and that the relative speed and change in direction would likely have caused a tremendous (if not fatal) g-force to anyone inhabiting the sphere. if this was a secret air force unmanned project, why would this test flight have been done in full view of the city between us?
content.summary: Metallic sphere moving in straight line up mountain range, then along the ridge of range

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from key west fl. we were flying in a commercial a/c , flying at 12,000 ft lookd down at [45 deg] out the right window near me in cloud bank noticed the foot ball shaped object floating among the cloud's. it was just going south with the clouds drifting with them sorta looked like a blimp at first but as we observed it it seemed to have no markings just a football shaped white thing ,could not tell size but may be 25ft to 50 ft? we were over the outer fringes of the southern florida area and lots of swamps and wet land below us. it was very clear that day. the clouds were big and fluffy and numerous with spaces between them ,that is were we spotted this object. no lights, no markings, no wings, it was about 2:00pm we were on a american airlines flight to miami from key west . the clouds were app. 1000 ft off the ground.
content.summary: We were flying in a commercial a/c , flying at 12,000 ft lookd down at 45 deg in clowd bank noticed the white foot ball shaped object floating among the cloud's

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from the beach with my girl on highway 95 to asheville. we hit (around) the 64th mile marker. there is a mountain range. disk appeared to our right above the mountain range. shaped just like a ufo that is depicted in movies and whatnot.  it was bright, bright silver emitting a trail of light that was also silver and outlined in green, as was the ufo. it was as if it wanted us to see it. moved way too fast for any plane, but slower than a shooting star. after we saw it, the moon began to do some strange things. it was very bright at first on our far right, then within less than a minute the moon moved to our far left and got very small. it moved quickly to the right again.
content.summary: Was driving with my girl home to asheville from the beach. on the highway, we saw a disk lit-up like silver with green outline appear and fall downward to the right. too slow to be a shooting star, too fast for an earth plane.

content.detailedDescription: At 0040 hrs i was driving due east on alameda ave toward 59 ave when an extremely bright blue light lit up the eastern sky what appeared to be approx 1 to 3 miles in front of me for approx 3 second. i stopped my car in the middle of the road because i was so bewildered by weekday i had just seen and tried to go through what it could have been and immediately concluded that it was not lightening and was way to bright to be some sort of residential light. just add i was considering what could have possibly created the massive brightness i had just witnessed and then another flash just as bright but about one second longer happened in the exact area as before. i was even more shocked the second time. i felt a wave of lightheadedness and some discomfort in my chest for about 20 seconds as i sat stopped in the road before i realized that i should probably not sit in the middle of the road so i began driving. i have never in my life seen a light of this nature. i do not know that this was a ufo but i did not know where else to report something of this nature.
content.summary: Unsure if was ufo, two extremely bright blue flashes lit the entire sky from the horizon up, not lightening, no clouds, nothing i have ever observed before

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work at the wamego city hospital on i 70 from topeka. saw a large round object hovering over the interstate. it was big!!! other people saw it because i pulled over to the side of the highway and so did other people from both directions it was very large, over both sides of 4 lane highway. round metal. had three rows of lights outside row white second row red inside row white. it was magnificent. felt like a once in a lifetime sight. not something i'll ever forget. just would like to know if anyone else reported it all those years ago. i didn't know how to then. i can draw it for you but i don't know how to do it on the computer.
content.summary: Saucer shape with rounded center on bottom three rings of red and white lights

content.detailedDescription: i was driving down the street with my wife and i began to look up at the renaissance building in downtown detroit. i had a clear view at the top of the building and i just saw a bright red lot strobing. we stopped and watched the object pulse for about 30 just sit above the building seperate from the buildings light. it then began to accend towards canada over the detroit river. it then disappeared. it was a bright red diamond kind of circular.
content.summary: Red strobing light

content.detailedDescription:
1) where: park city utah, by sr 40, jogging. about 3:30 pm, late march 2013.
2) what made me notice the object: happened to look up; it was a beautiful day, so i was taking in the sky.
3) my initial impression: a balloon.
4) description:
object 1. looked like a reflective ball bearing. i immediately recognized it was not a balloon. the object i noticed simply hovered, minimal movement, reflective, completely silent. i took three video clips with my iphone.
objects 2-5: i only noticed these on subsequent review of the video on a large screen. these move across my video screen, right to left, covering the entire field of view in less than 1 second. it really is just a peripheral flash of movement barely noticeable (in fact i did not notice it; my sister in law noticed it when i sent her the video nearly two months after the sighting/video). frame by frame review on my big screen tv reveals possibly three more similar objects in motion, total of 5.
5) awestruck. 
6) it simply faded from view.

note: i have attached three short iphone video clips.
img_2882-2884.
img_2882 is the clip that shows multiple objects. attention to the 27 second mark (0:27/0:44)
content.summary: Late march 2013. park city utah. one ball-bearing sphere observed 15 minutes; additional objects seen only later on video review.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished watching a movie at the above address when i decided to go outside for a smoke. as i light my cigarette i looked to the south over a set of trees in the yard. that is when i noticed a brilliant glow of lights about 35 to 45 degrees off of the horizon. the lights were alternating red and red-orange in color. i thought that the lights were mars at first and tried to get my bearing on direction. i continued to smoke watching the lights blowing it off as a planet. then the lights began to move very rapidly down towards the horizon. i was in shock so i called for my girlfriend to come and take a look. when i did this the lights began a very rapid accent toward the atmosphere. when my girlfriend did come outside from brushing her teeth i pointed the lights out to her and she was awestruck. no sooner than she got out there as if the craft knew we were watching the lights shut off. but, i could still make out the shape of the craft and what looked to be some kind of vapor trail as it exited the atmosphere at a high rate of speed. in all the viewing was about 10 minutes long.
content.summary: Observed it in southern sky and watched it move very fast in all directions then witnessed it disappear out of the atmosphere rapidly

content.detailedDescription: I was told by 2 coworkers that they seen these lights , objects, etc, 2 weeks, on a saturday, before i did. i seen  5 orange ufo's back in june 1984, which was also witnessed by several others including law enforcement. i have always studied the skies since my exp. in 1974. after my 2 co workers told me their story, which i believed them, as i interviewed the seperately, i just kind of kept their stories in my thoughts.  on 04may13, my only day off of work, i started to do work around the house, as the weather was starting to let us all get some outdoor duties done. my friends described their incident as follows: sighted was approx. 25-30 red circular lights, very high up, no sounds & observed for about 15 mins. but, they said that the 25-30 were being led by a lone red light or? ahead of them.. when i seen them 2 weeks later, there were the same amt of lights, in a non formation pattern & at least 5 of them, breaking formation & doing little lite tricks or showing off if you will. but in my case, the lone  ufo, (lite or ?) was at the rear of the undisciplined formation. i observed them for approx. 21 mins. i watched them till they disappeared. during this timetable, a jet airliner was above. it was moving at its reg speed, with red/green lights. the ufo's, which were much, much higher were moving slow except for when the 5 were doing their little tricks for us, on earth to see. i know that these were ufo's as i have been amazed by them since 1974.My feelings are that, i remained calm . i enjoyed seeing them, once again & i would share my story with anyone who wants to hear it. i was a member of mufon, many years ago then dropped out due to military commitments. i would like to rejoin.
content.summary: I was told by 2 coworkers that they seen this event 2 weeks earlier. (they told me before i actually seen the same)

content.detailedDescription: Was watering my dog at 12:05 am, may 15th, 2013, prior to retiring and observing sliver of moon due west of my location, and transiting faint satellite headed south from north between myself and the moon. as i glanced up directly overhead to the "big dipper" star cluster, a large white light flared up near the second planet on the "handle" of the big dipper, i first thought it was a meteor burning up "head on" to my perspective as it was an instantaneous intense white light, then settled down to a smaller white glow about the intensity of the space station flying over. the object during the flare phase did not move, but as it started to settle down, it physically moved in a south east direction for the equivalent length two of the planets of the "big dipper" handle, then sharply changed direction to a due north direction until is was directly under the bottom of the "pan" of the big dipper, where it appeared the light started to fade out as if it was leaving directly away (going away) from the earth. the whole episode took about 20 seconds. unfortunately no photos or video, but intrigued to see if anyone spotted this event. there were no aircraft in the vicinity, and no nearby clouds for perhaps reflections.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Round object light flare (intense white to medium) with directional movement near star cluster "big dipper"

content.detailedDescription: Employee was witness took pic on cellphone passed it to me
content.summary: Employee was witness

content.detailedDescription: Was taking picyures of clouds on the 12th of january,on the 7th of may just browse through my pics on the tv and notice the object . have photo the time of date . was taken by htc cel phone picture is very clear.Shape like the one you have in the mufon add.
content.summary: Surprise to see that i actually had a clear picture of a ufo on my cel phone

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed at the time. i only remember three beings by my side in a room.  a smaller being was on top of me. they communicated that they wanted me to hug it. so i did. then it held me too tight. i tried to get it off me. i felt very strong and threw him off of me, he came back again. at that time, i was scared. that is all i remember. when i woke up and tried to remember what happened, i felt that they wanted me to nurture that being. i have been abducted many times before over my lifetime. i have been in contact telepathically with aliens as well. i have also seen ufos and aliens in the past.
content.summary: Being taken to a room that was made of steel or some type of metal

content.detailedDescription:
1.	on may 8, 2013, at 7:45pm toronto time, west jet flight 629, the plane was descending to toronto pearson airport for landing, and traveling at 361mph and 5500 feet according to the information/entertainment display screen behind the seat.
2.	my window seat number was 3f. when i was looking out the window and saw an object went from the front to the back. i couldn't tell the object was stationary or was moving. a boy (about 7 years old) sat behind me was looking out the window, at the same time, and he was saying "what is that?"
3.	the object was in clear view and around 1000 feet below the right side of the plane. it was square, had no wings, beige in color, and relatively big. by comparing the object with the jet engine view, the cross section of the object is about 10% of the jet engine air intake diameter.
4.	the whole event lasted for 1 second. it was an amazing sighting and a second seemed quite a long time.
5.	a drawing is attached.
content.summary: Square object observed from airplane window

content.detailedDescription: May 14, 2013 @ about 10pm. i saw a red light moving erratically behind trees on ft carson by gate 19/ i25 exit 128 from east of i25 in fountain. there were also two helicopters circling just north of the area after the light disappeared. i only saw it for a second, before it went dark
content.summary: Red light moving erratically

content.detailedDescription:
Got home from watching hockey game around 10pm (sens lost) may 15, 2013.
had to take out the garbage, so i walked across the street to see what recycle box the neighbour's put out. i was walking back to my house, looking east i noticed a number of white objects flying west, i thought at first it was canadian geese flying because they are always in a triangle, but then i realized it was night, so i focused in closer and realized it was about 6-7 lights forming a triangle. i wasn't sure if it was one object, but then it turned and veered north and went behind a large tree. all the lights stayed in position so i assume it was one object. i then ran down the street a bit to see if it would appear on the other side of the tree but nothing. if i had to guess, it looked like it was 2-5 miles away, 3500 feet up, but can't be sure. there was a plane directly overhead as well (looked like 30,000 ft.), which i kept looking at to make sure i wasn't seeing things.
content.summary: Moving triangle of lights that changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
El echo sucede en la ciudad de quilmes bs as argentina.
los objetos estan todo el tiempo en la zona .Lo capto al fotografiarlo ya que no son visible a primera vista estan muy alto en el cielo-
a veces afecta la electricidad .Aparecen al bajarlos a la computadora
vuelvo a explicar que solo las camaras fotograficas lo captan .Estan alrededor de la zona donde vivo  -me di cuenta de estos echos hace un ao la primera vez fue octubre de 2012.De las 12 pm en adelante hasta las 18pm son de dia siempre
 una solo ves logre una de noche -
tengo mas preguntas que respuestas con todo esto, pero es fascinante ver las fotos y saber que estan ahi..
saludos y hasta pronto
marcela-
content.summary: No visible al ojo humano ,lo capta la camara fotografica

content.detailedDescription: I was telling my friend that i photographed jupiter the other day, and saw a bright star. i showed it to her, and talk that this one could be a planet or space station, because it was so bright. then i stopped walking to check if it was stationary or not. then the "bright star" just drew a path like a check sign and disappeared behind the buildings. the change of path was like it hit some wall & bounced..
content.summary: I was telling my friend that i photographed jupiter the other day
